it.polimi.se2018.model.objectives.privateobjectives

Class ShadesOfPurpleObjective

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.mvc.model.objectives.ObjectiveCard
      • it.polimi.se2018.mvc.model.objectives.privateobjectives.PrivateObjective
        • it.polimi.se2018.mvc.model.objectives.privateobjectives.ShadesOfPurpleObjective
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ShadesOfPurpleObjective
extends PrivateObjective
    This is the shades of purple objective card. It extends PrivateObjective Design pattern Singleton is used in this class, because only one instance is used in every running game
    Author:
    Emilio Imperiali
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • instance

        public static ShadesOfPurpleObjective instance(java.lang.String title)
        Parameters:
        title - it's the title of this card
        Returns:
        a new instance of this card if does not exist, the existing instance otherwise (as expected in the Singleton pattern)

      • evalPoints

        public int evalPoints(Player player)
        The points are evaluated as it follows: all the values of the purple dice in the player's window are added. The input value represents the points given to the player by this objective
        Specified by:
        evalPoints in class ObjectiveCard
        Parameters:
        player - the player whose points must be evaluated
        Returns:
        the points given by this card to the player
